tswitem.name: Fierce Augment Resonator
tswitem.tooltip:
Fierce Augment Resonator
An unattuned damage augment.
Resonating this augment to an active ability will increase your penetration chance by 1%/ 2%/ 3%/ 4%/ 5% and your critical hit chance by 1%/ 2%/ 3%/ 4%/ 5% for this ability.
To attune this augment, place it in the assembly window with:
  • 3 Attuned Accurate Augment Resonators
  • 12 Pure lu runes
  • 12 Pure trinity runes
  • 72 Pure fire
